 javax.security.auth.Subject FallbackAuthnMod.initSubject(AuthenticationContext authCtx, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          provides principal/subject with fallback data updates or initializes (if null yet) the given authentication context's Subject with the proper user
